organisation_name: Fédération Internationale des Footballeurs Professionnelles Division Europe (FIFPro)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
FIFPro Division Europe is the European Division of FIFPro (International federation of professional football player trade unions) 
FIFPro Division Europe has a formal cooperation with the ETUC and UNI Europa 
FIFPro Division Europe is a member of UNI World Athletes
goals__remit:
FIFPro Division Europe is the European branch of FIFPro. FIFPro is a not-for-profit organization. It is the international federation of affiliated professional football players associations. FIFPro is the worldwide representative organization for all professional players; more than 65.000 in total. FIFPro has existed since 1965 and currently has 57 members, 3 candidate members and 11 observers.  
FIFPro Division Europe consists of 28 members and 3 candidates (Israel, Kazakhstan and FYROM) and 5 observers (Bosnia and Herzegovina, Georgia, Iceland, Slovakia and Turkey).
relevant_communication:
-    Implementation of Autonomous Agreement on Minimum Requirements for Standard Player Contracts 
-    Project on the implementation on EU policies in the field of Match Fixing and Dual Careers
